1.title: LEND Survey: Understanding Dementia Narratives
1.introduction: Thank you for your interest in participating in our research. This survey helps us understand what narratives are important to people affected by dementia. Your responses are anonymous and will contribute to improving support for people living with dementia and their carers. The survey should take approximately 10 minutes to complete.

sections.title: Your Background
sections.description: We'd like to learn a little about your connection to dementia.

questions.label: How would you describe your connection to dementia?
options: I care for someone with dementia
I am a family member of someone with dementia

questions.label: What region of the UK are you based in? (Optional)

sections.title: Narrative Experience
sections.description: This section explores your experience with narratives and stories about dementia.

questions.label: Where have you encountered stories or narratives about dementia? (Select all that apply)
Can you describe a narrative or story about dementia that you found particularly helpful, comforting, or meaningful?
How important do you think narratives and stories are for people affected by dementia?

sections.title: Your Needs and Preferences
sections.description: Help us understand what features and content would be most valuable to you.

questions.label: What aspects are most important to you in a dementia narrative resource? (Select up to 3)
What format would you prefer for accessing narratives?
How often would you be interested in accessing new narratives?

sections.title: Additional Feedback
sections.description: Any additional comments or suggestions are welcome.

questions.label: Is there anything else you would like to share about narratives, dementia support, or this research?
questions.placeholder: Your thoughts are valuable to us...

questions.label: Would you be open to being contacted about future research opportunities?
options: Yes, I'm happy to be contacted
No, I prefer not to be contacted
